Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT DISTINCT, NUM_APOL_SINISTROCOUNT(*)
FROM seguros.v0sini_lanclote1
 
WHERE  FONTE     =  :FONTE
  AND  NUM_LOTE  =  :NUM_LOTE
  AND  OPERACAO  BETWEEN  3000  AND  3999
  AND  (    num_apol_sinistro between 0103100000000 and 0103199999999
         or num_apol_sinistro between 0105300000000 and 0105399999999)
group by num_apol_sinistro
having count(*) > 1
/
 END SQL
